copy_location¶

Nautilus extension to copy file or folder location to the clipboard.

class copy_location.CopyLocationExtension[source]¶

Bases: Object, MenuProvider

Extension to add ‘Copy Location’ menu in Nautilus file manager.

copy_location(menu: MenuItem, files: list[FileInfo]) → None[source]¶

Copy the selected file or folder path to clipboard and send a notification.

get_file_items(*args) → list[MenuItem][source]¶

Return a list with one ‘Copy Location’ menu item for a single file or folder.

Project name not set
